title: Man shoots himself in the leg in Humboldt Park
content:
A man shot himself in the leg Wednesday night in the Humboldt Park neighborhood on the West Side.
The 35-year-old suffered a gunshot wound to the right leg about 8:30 p.m. in the 3600 block of West Division, according to Chicago Police. He initially told investigators that two men had walked up and shot him, but further investigation indicated that his injury was self-inflicted.
He showed up at Stroger Hospital, where he was listed in good condition, police said.
A police source said the man is a documented gang member and that he was not cooperating with investigators.
